ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Develop" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Product', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Develop'), /* ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Develop'), */ OR ( ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISPICKVAL(Category_of_interest__c,""), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When you mark Qualify as Complete, your Opportunity moves to Develop. In order to mark Develop as current stage you need to complete these key fields: Competition Positioning, RFQ Received Date and Application
